channel.title: Unban trowa
channel.description: hey guys im trowa, and i was banned like a year ago cause some idiot named girlman123 was a friend with some admins and he always done what he wanted at the server so i was tired of him cause he was a retarded idiot so i griefed his house because i was mad cause he killed me like 8 times just cause he wanted and he stole all my things so i rage griefed with no success cause they rolled back his house so it was a waste of time.. now that a year passed i want to play again in the server without griefing no one just playing with friends so please unbann trowa, ty

item.title: Unban trowa
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:2, topic:436024”]I don’t know, I really don’t.

I was told you were banned for killing girlman, they failed to mention you evaded like four times from a perm ban and you/your friends have now came on demanding an unban, and to top that off I was just spammed for 15 minutes.

Not looking to good is it, eh? There seems to be this false illusion that permanent is temporary.[/quote]

I don’t know what their definition of permanent is.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban trowa
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I don’t know, I really don’t.

I was told you were banned for killing girlman, they failed to mention you evaded like four times from a perm ban and you/your friends have now came on demanding an unban, and to top that off I was just spammed for 15 minutes.

Not looking to good is it, eh? There seems to be this false illusion that permanent is temporary.

Read full topic
